cause.description:
Redemption Song inc 501c, Project: Darfur inc, And The Orlando Progressive Alliance
will be presenting a series of concerts, speaker, and fundraisers on the Issues of Domestic Violence and the current Genocide in Darfur, Sudan. proceeds of the event will go towards Local domestic violence / Darfur Charity's and Non-Profits
Our first Goal is to raise $ 3,000 dollars to go towards the event and any immediate needs for Tampa and Orlando woman and family shelter.
1. Bring Peace to Darfur Sudan through Humanity's and Global Efforts.
2. Raise Awareness and Funds For Local Domestic Violence shelter and issues
3. Bring social justice and direct action to Local and international problem through community events
cause.mission: End Domestic Violence/ Peace in Darfur Event
cause.name: Operation Music : Orlando
